name: Extreme Snow Bike Simulator 3D - Ride the mountain bike in frozen arctic hills
name_original: Extreme Snow Bike Simulator 3D - Ride the mountain bike in frozen arctic hills
description:
Ride the snow bike in the frozen arctic world and have real time hilly ski adventure. Extreme snow bike simulator is the realistic 3D snowmobile experience. Drive snow bike in open world map with race challenges & bike park missions. Extreme snow bike is a superb 3D game where you play as snow cross rider and control a super fast snowmobile.

Snow bike riding is dream and passion for all roadies and biker boys as they love bike ride on freeway. Drive bike on really fast speed as pro biker and break the speed records. You really need to take extremely sharp turns to pass deadly downhill ways. Ride snowmobile and get unlimited fun and excitement with its challenging game play. If you like extreme speeds racing game with powerful engine sounds then you will love this awesome bike rider game.

Features
• 15 levels of extreme snowmobile riding experience
• 3 snowmobile to select and ride from
• Challenging tasks and trilling game play
• Lifelike graphics with high quality sounds
